1.0.3.en: Fixed API Key input screen. Improved error handling.

1.1.0.en: Added support for Nest Thermostats and Temperature Sensors. Fixed intermittent issue with Starling hub discovery. Changed permission requirements to only need Read. Thanks Jamison for the contribution!

2.0.0.en: Upgraded to Starling API v2. This brings in all Google Home devices connected to you Starling Hub. Also added full support for live video and stills from camera class devices.
